document_data.mainbody:
olite, also known as ool stones in the lands around the Sea of Fallen Stars, was a variety of quartz which occurred in tiny egg-shaped spherules.
These ornamental stones were usually solid brown in color and were very similar to algae. Individual oolite spherules were about  in (1&ndash2 mm) or less, which was too small to be cut.
Powdered ool stones were a prized ingredient when casting spells that purified or neutralized, and in making the magic ink for scribing those same spells.
